hi, i'm vaibhav

crafting pixel-perfect designs with a touch of problem-solving magic - welcome to my digital playground!

Readme.

I am a passionate frontend developer with a hunger for learning and a knack for crafting exceptional products. With my skills in design and code, I take pride in bringing ideas to life and delivering high-quality solutions. I thrive in fast-paced, collaborative environments that allow me to work closely with my team, continuously iterate and innovate.

My ability to effectively communicate and solve complex problems adds value to any project, and I enjoy taking up new challenges that push me beyond my comfort zone. When I'm not busy building awesome things, you can find me at the gym, sketching, exploring new destinations or on the cricket field.

Let's build cool things!

Tailwind CSS

My SQL
Java

Some Things I've Built.

I believe that the most effective way to learn is by building, even if it means encountering challenges and having to figure out things on my own. That's why I enjoy building projects from scratch and utilizing online resources to overcome any obstacles that arise.

Kanun

Kanun is a modern and sleek landing page template for law websites, featuring details of lawyers and their practice areas, along with a convenient appointment form.
HTML CSS
</>

Manage

This is a landing page for a ficticious company called "Manage". It features a header, a hero section, a features section, a testimonials section, a pricing section, and a footer.
HTML CSS JavaScript
</>

Snout-Fest

Roll the dice and try to score points in this fun game. Avoid rolling a zero, use the hold button strategically, and be the first person to reach a total score of 100 points or more to win the game.
HTML CSS JavaScript
